statements: SELECT player_id, player_name, experience FROM game_progress WHERE level > 10;
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements FROM game_progress WHERE experience BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT player_name, level FROM game_progress WHERE achievements ->> 'completion' = '100%';
SELECT player_id, player_name, level, experience FROM game_progress ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM game_progress WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY level ASC;
SELECT player_name, achievements->>'level_1' AS level_1_achievement FROM game_progress WHERE achievements->>'level_1' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, player_name, experience FROM game_progress WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT MAX(level) AS max_level, MIN(experience) AS min_experience FROM game_progress;
SELECT * FROM game_progress;
SELECT player_id, level FROM game_progress ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%completion%';
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM game_progress WHERE experience >= 1000 ORDER BY level ASC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, timestamp FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name = 'Master of the Game' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_progress JOIN achievements ON game_progress.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE achievements.timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, level, experience, achievement_name FROM game_progress LEFT JOIN achievements ON game_progress.player_id = achievements.player_id ORDER BY level DESC, experience ASC;
SELECT * FROM GameProgress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, progress FROM GameProgress WHERE level > 5;
SELECT achievement_name, date_achieved FROM Achievements WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM PlayerInfo ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_score FROM PlayerInfo WHERE total_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM GameProgress WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY player_id DESC, progress ASC
SELECT player_name, level FROM PlayerInfo INNER JOIN GameProgress ON PlayerInfo.player_id = GameProgress.player_id WHERE total_score > 1000
SELECT player_name, game_name, achievement_name FROM PlayerInfo JOIN Achievements USING (player_id) ORDER BY date_achieved DESC
SELECT * FROM Achievements WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date_achieved, '%Y') = '2022'
SELECT player_name, total_score, progress FROM PlayerInfo JOIN GameProgress USING (player_id)
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, progress_percent FROM player p JOIN progress pr ON p.player_id = pr.player_id JOIN game g ON pr.game_id = g.game_id WHERE progress_percent >= 50;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM player p JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT player_name, game_name, progress_percent, timestamp FROM player p JOIN progress pr ON p.player_id = pr.player_id JOIN game g ON pr.game_id = g.game_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM game WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player.player_name, game.game_name, progress.progress_percent FROM player INNER JOIN progress ON player.player_id = progress.player_id INNER JOIN game ON progress.game_id = game.game_id;

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name, achievements.achievement_date FROM player LEFT JOIN achievements ON player.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE achievements.achievement_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, level FROM GameProgress;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM Achievements ORDER BY date_achieved DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, registration_date FROM PlayerInfo WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, score, date_recorded FROM Scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY date_recorded ASC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM Items WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, registration_date FROM PlayerInfo
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM Achievements ORDER BY date_achieved DESC
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM Scores GROUP BY player_id
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM Items WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT player_id, level, last_checkpoint FROM GameProgress WHERE level >= 5
